channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bridge of Lies
channel.desc: Ross Kemp presents the quiz show where a team - a family of four, Anna, Gemma, Zoe, and Andreas- take on the Bridge of Lies. One by one, they all face the Bridge, choosing who faces each crossing depending on the question category.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Pointless
channel.desc: A twist on the classic quiz show formula, contestants search through the depths of their knowledge in an attempt to score as few points as possible.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at Six
channel.desc: The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team, followed by weather.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The One Show
channel.desc: Alex Jones and Roman Kemp bring you the stories that matter from across the country.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: EastEnders
channel.desc: Harvey sets his sights on a new venture, Lauren and Peter are overwhelmed by recent events, and George offers an olive branch.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Panorama
channel.desc: Ros Atkins sets out to discover the truth about how our money is spent and why politicians keep running into trouble when they try to cut spending.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Doorbell Detectives
channel.desc: Matt Allwright meets a group of doorbell detectives from Greater Manchester whose footage foiled a prolific criminal roaming the streets at night when his identity was exposed on their doorbell cameras. Former police inspector Anton Sullivan investigates how best to use a smart doorbell. And the son of a vulnerable pensioner tells how a doorbell video saved his dad from a ruthless gang of doorstep scammers.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Bombing of Pan Am 103
channel.desc: Over a decade after the Lockerbie bombing, following much debate and international negotiation, the accused will finally stand trial. The venue will be a purpose-built Scottish court in the Netherlands. Bereaved relatives around the world campaign for access to the trial. Scottish police and the FBI continue to work tirelessly to secure vital witness testimony and deliver meticulously collected forensic evidence. Will the investigators finally secure justice for the victims and their families?

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at Ten
channel.desc: The latest national and international news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
channel.desc: Roy Wood Jr is host, with guest panellists comedian and actor Guz Khan and broadcaster Kirsty Wark joining team captains Paul Merton and Ian Hislop as they delve into the news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: I Kissed a Boy
channel.desc: A love triangle in the masseria gets messy, but when Dannii delivers a cocktail party with the ultimate twist, decisions in the will be made like never before.
